nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:filled_map","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Campaign Poster\",\"color\":\"red\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"If these posters are being dropped\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"en-masse, who's responsible for\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"picking them all up?\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Unlocked for all players who\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"participated in the Better Mayors\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"alpha test.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"SPECIAL\",\"color\":\"red\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"CAMPAIGN_POSTER"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
